headerTitle: Optimize your shipping  operations with our fast and reliable freight train services.
haveClients: HAVE COME TO US AND WERE SATISFIED
calculateCost: Calculate the cost of cargo delivery

serviceConnected: The service is connected to the total value of the shipment
ourGoal: OUR GOAL IS TO STRIVE FOR THE BEST RESULTS
ourGoal1: Transportation and logistics company "Altyn Döwür" has been operating on the market since June 2020.
ourGoal2: Over the years, the company has managed to build up considerable experience in the field of railroad cargo transportation both within the country and abroad.
ourGoal3: We carry out railroad cargo transportation in the CIS countries and third countries (transit, export, import) and freight forwarding.
ourGoal4: Today our company has about 220 boxcars, 290 gondola cars, 10 fittings, 200 tank cars for liquefied gas, 110 tank cars for transportation of light oil products.
service1Desc: It is an efficient and economical way to transport large and heavy goods over long distances. They are characterized by low cost, reliability and environmental friendliness. This is one of the main services provided by the business company “Altyn Döwür”.
service2Desc: The delivery of the goods you order is also a service of the “Altyn Döwür” business company. We will find, order and deliver the cargo and goods you need in the shortest possible time and at the best prices
service3Desc: By filling out an application, you can activate the cargo tracking service, which will allow you to control the route, location and time of arrival of your cargo.
adress: 744007, Turkmenistan, Ashgabat, Great Saparmyrat Turkmenbashi Avenue, 7
cargoTrackConfirmationModalTitle: This service have a cost and it’s performed on a per-vagon
serviceEnabledModal: The service is connected to the total value of the shipment
comment1Comment: We have been working with Altyn Dovur in various areas for over 3 years. We would like to thank the management and all the company’s specialists for their prompt work. We will continue to cooperate.
comment2Comment: I recently used the services of Altyn Dovur and would like to share my experience. Overall, I was very pleased with the quality of the services provided. I would like to note the excellent organization of the process. The order was accepted and processed promptly, and the cargo was transported on time. The company demonstrated a high level of professionalism, providing detailed information about each stage of the transportation and guaranteeing that the cargo would be delivered safe and sound. I would definitely recommend Altyn Dovur to anyone looking for a reliable and responsible logistics partner. I would be happy to use their services again in the future.
comment3Comment: I used the services of the company «Altyn Dovur» to transport cargo on wagons and was pleased with the result. The process was organized clearly and professionally: the cargo arrived at the appointed time and without damage. I especially liked the efficiency in resolving emerging issues. The only comment is that I would like to improve the cargo tracking system. In general, I recommend the company for reliability and quality of service.
